plan: This plan is designed to progressively build your endurance, strength, and climbing ability in preparation for the Himalayan race in August. The focus is on gradually increasing the intensity and duration of rides, incorporating rest days, and including elevation training to simulate the race conditions.

day_wise.title: First Day
day_wise.description: First day of the training for warmup

day_wise.title: Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Long ride to build endurance. Keep a steady pace.

day_wise.title: Recovery Day
day_wise.description: Rest day to recover and rebuild muscles.

day_wise.title: Climbing Intervals
day_wise.description: Focus on hill repeats to improve climbing strength.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a day off to allow your body to rest.

day_wise.title: Tempo Ride
day_wise.description: Sustained effort at a moderate pace to improve speed.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: Easy ride to promote blood flow and recovery.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Complete rest to recover fully.

day_wise.title: Strength Ride
day_wise.description: Ride with a focus on strength training and intervals.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Day off to rest and prepare for the next ride.

day_wise.title: Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Long distance ride to build stamina.

day_wise.title: Recovery Day
day_wise.description: Easy day to help muscles recover.

day_wise.title: Hill Sprints
day_wise.description: Short, intense uphill sprints to build power.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Rest day to allow for recovery.

day_wise.title: Tempo Ride
day_wise.description: Steady ride at a moderate pace for endurance.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: Gentle ride to promote recovery and blood flow.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Full rest to recover and prepare for training.

day_wise.title: Climbing Intervals
day_wise.description: Intense climbing workout to improve hill performance.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a break to allow your body to recover.

day_wise.title: Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Focus on maintaining a steady pace over a long distance.

day_wise.title: Recovery Day
day_wise.description: Rest and recover from the previous rides.

day_wise.title: Hill Repeats
day_wise.description: Practice on hills to build climbing strength.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a day off to rest and recover.

day_wise.title: Tempo Ride
day_wise.description: Maintain a moderate pace to build endurance.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: Easy ride to help muscles recover.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Rest to prepare for the next week of training.

day_wise.title: Strength Ride
day_wise.description: Incorporate interval training to improve strength.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Rest and recover to maintain peak performance.

day_wise.title: Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Long ride to build stamina and endurance.

day_wise.title: Recovery Day
day_wise.description: Easy day to allow for muscle recovery.

goal: Prepare for the Himalayan race in August by building endurance, strength, and climbing ability through a structured training plan.
